title: Global Studies Academic Program Fund
description: To support the program and the student participants through study abroad scholarships, program fee scholarships, stipends to defray room and board costs, and to recruit a diverse group of students to participate in the program at CU Boulder.
marketingContent: To support the program and the student participants through study abroad scholarships, program fee scholarships, stipends to defray room and board costs, and to recruit a diverse group of students to participate in the program at CU Boulder.
